summary: "Now, I don't know about you, but I don't much fancy hanging tomorrow."
body:
occidentalavian:

“Now, I don’t know about you, but I don’t much fancy hanging tomorrow.”

It’s Tempest and Callisto (and Minerva!) from @diosmaden’s comic Heart of the Storm!

I’ve been practicing using Hero Forge’s new kitbash feature and wanted to test it by recreating someone else’s characters. I’ve been a fan of the comic and these characters for a long time, hope I did them justice!

Links to the figures below!

Keep reading

omg??? this is so cute you’ve done an incredible job it looks just like them!! thank you so much!! ü•∫ü•∫

summary: sillay scribbly comic bc i wanted to capture the fact thistle has infinite charisma if she keeps her mouth shut (thirst trap...
body: sillay scribbly comic bc i wanted to capture the fact thistle has infinite charisma if she keeps her mouth shut (thirst trap thistle gif) vs absolutely zero rizz as soon as that mouth opens (this. LAGVKBFGKHFGH) anyway i just think theyre funny

body:
diosmaden:

Edel: What are you going to do with that big halberd? Gonna hit me? Better make it hurt. Better make it count. Better kill me in one shot
